No. 25664)) Sub: Re-constitution of Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) to inquire into complaints related to Sexual Harassment of Women  Employees of NHAI at workplace reg: In supersession of NHAI' $ Policy Circular No_ 11041/217/2007-Admn_ (Admin / Finance 131/2013) dated 30.12.2013 and OM No. NHAI/11041/92/2013-HR.I dated 09.03.2021 it has been decided with approval of the Competent Authority to re-constitute the Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) of NHAI with the following composition to inquire into complaints related to Sexual Harassment of Women Employees of NHAl at Work place in accordance with the provisions of the Sexual Harassment of Women at Work place (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013 [PoSH Act, 2013]: Smt: Akta Kumari, GM (Tech:) Presiding Officer (ii) Sh. P K Mohapatra, GM (IT) Member (iii) Ms. Manvi Dikshit Sharma External Member (Advocate in Supreme Court f India; Address- DDA Flats, Sec-E1, Tower F1-05 Vasant Kunj, Delhi-110070 , Mobile No. 9999499521, Email ID-manvi advocate@yahoo com) (iv) Sh. Krishan Dalal, DGM (HR/ Admin:) Member Smt. Madhavi Sridhar DGM (HR/ Admin:) Member Secretary The composition of the Committee may be modified from time to time as per requirement by the Office Memorandum: 2 In accordance with the Dept. of Personnel & Training OM No.11013/3/2009-Estt: (A) dated 02.02.2009 (as amended from time to time), for inquiring into complaints made against officers of the level of Secretary and Additional Secretary and equivalent level in the Government of India in the Ministries/ Departments and Organizations directly under control of the Central Government (other than Central PUs), a Complaints Committee has been constituted vide Cabinet Secretariat's Order No.1 dated 26.09.2008 (as amended from time to time). The Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) referred in para 1 above will, therefore, inquire into complaints of Sexual Harassment against only those Government Servants, who are not covered by the Cabinet Secretariat's Order No.1 dated 26.09.2008 (as amended from time to time) Contd: 2i - (M {39 NHAI Y.,
